tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_vitals (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
  temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    admission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Vitals (
    vitals_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    decision_text TEXT,
    decision_date TIMESTAMP,
    physician_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    admission_date TIMESTAMP,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Vitals (
    vitals_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(15),
    temperature FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Medications (
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage FLOAT,
    frequency VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  admit_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE vitals (
  vital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(15),
  temperature FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE medications (
  med_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  med_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage varchar(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE staff (
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_message TEXT,
  alert_time TIMESTAMPTZ
)
